text: Loraine Gonzales (born October 6, 1977) is a Wheelchair basketball player who was on the US team that won gold in Wheelchair basketball at the 2008 Summer Paralympics. She is of the Dallas–Fort Worth metroplex.Tuscaloosa News Her husband David is also a wheelchair basketball player. == References == == External links == *Team USA bio Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Paralympic wheelchair basketball players of the United States Category:Paralympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from the Dallas–Fort Worth metroplex Category:Medalists at the 2008 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in wheelchair basketball Category:Wheelchair basketball players at the 2008 Summer Paralympics
title: Loraine Gonzales
